title: vA gaNapatiyE
sahitya:
vA gaNapatiyE vazhipaDum anbarkku kanivuDan aruL tara vA


anupallavi

  AgamamAm nAn maraigaLum vaNangiDa Anai mukhanE karuNAkaranE viraindu


caraNam    manjaL piLLaiyArAi mangaLam aruLvAi mana vyAkUlam tanai maraiya sheivAi nenjam kanindunnai tanjam aDaindAl nenjam magizha nalangaLait-taruvAi enavE
